fields.description: Base type of the entity

fields.description: Schema location

fields.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

fields.description: Maximum number of offerings that can be involved in Quote under this category.

fields.name: offeringCountMin
fields.description: Minimum number of offerings that should be added to Quote under this category.

fields.name: offeringCountMaxRetain
fields.description: Optional attribute, which is needed to calculate max allowance of child OTSs offerings under the Category, when Parent Quote Item has action MODIFY, DISCONNECT, or DASH (i.e. to consider already consumed and paid OTSs in modify cases)

fields.name: offeringCountMinRetain
fields.description: Optional attribute, which is needed to calculate min allowance of child OTSs offerings under the Category, when Parent Quote Item has action MODIFY, DISCONNECT, or DASH (i.e. to consider already consumed and paid OTSs in modify cases).

fields.description: This attribute defines the order of the entity in UI.

fields.description: It is not applicable anymore, because Category can have more then one parent Category

fields.description: The period for which the category is valid. TimePeriod contains startDateTime (type:DateTime) and endDateTime (type: DateTime).

fields.name: version
fields.description: Category version

fields.name: productOffering
fields.description: A list of product offering references (ProductOfferingRef [*]). A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information

fields.name: subCategory
fields.description: A list of (sub-)category references (CategoryRef [*]). The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other (sub-)categories and/or product offerings

fields.description: List of filtering characteristics

fields.description: Extended parameters in <String, List<String>> format

fields.description: Link to appropriate localization data. Used for name, description localization in UI.

fields.description: Reference Product Offering Category Constraint. CategoryConstraint defines min/max allowances for number of instances of offerings under the Offering category (Top and Sub category), regarding the determined scope (Location, Quote, Customer).

fields.description: The attribute defines that a Category should be hidden on UI.

types.name: PriceAlteration
types.description: The entity represents an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an order item.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short descriptive name such as "Monthly discount

fields.name: description
fields.description: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this Order Item Price Alteration

fields.name: priceType
fields.description: category that describes the price such as recurring, one time and usage

fields.name: unitOfMeasure
fields.description:
Unit of measure. Could be minutes, GB and so on
Note: Not supported in the current version

fields.name: recurringChargePeriod
fields.description: Charge Period

fields.name: applicationDuration
fields.description:
Duration during which the alteration applies on the order item price (for
instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge)

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations on the order item price

fields.name: priceCondition
fields.deprecationReason: The attribute will be deleted next release 23_1 cause of not supported any more

fields.name: validFor
fields.description: The period for which the Price Alteration is valid

fields.name: productOfferingPrice
fields.description: Related product offering Price

fields.name: action
fields.description: Price Alteration action

fields.name: applied
fields.description: If alteration is applied.

fields.name: atType
fields.description: Indicates the (class) type of the Price Alteration

fields.name: applicationMode
fields.description: Parameter states whether a Discount is applied automatically or manually

fields.name: solo
fields.description: Parameter from Product Offering Catalog that indicates where this Discount is compatible with other ones or not

fields.name: weight
fields.description: Weight of the Price Alteration

fields.name: extendedParameters

fields.description: Units of discount application duration, e.g. Day, Week, Month, Quarter, Year.

fields.name: priceAlterationType
fields.description: Type of Price Alteration.

fields.name: alterationOnSuspendedPrice
fields.description: Flag indicates whether Price Alteration applies to the suspended Price.

fields.description: Unique identifier of the ticket from CPM. It's filled in case when Price Alteration of the 'REPLACEMENT' type (that represents price override) is created via ticket in the CPM.

fields.description: Ticket creation reason. It's filled in case when Price Alteration of the 'REPLACEMENT' type (that represents price override) is created via ticket in the CPM.

fields.name: priceComponentSpecificationRef
fields.description: ID of Price Specification, copied from the QuotePrice.priceComponentSpecificationRef. This attribute is populated only for PriceAlteration with priceAlterationType = 'DISCOUNT'.

types.name: ProdSpecCharValueUse
types.description: A use of the ProdSpecCharacteristicValue by a ProductOffering to which additional properties (attributes) apply or override the properties of similar properties contained in ProdSpecCharacteristicValue.

fields.name: characteristicId
fields.description: Product Specification Characteristic unique id from Product Offering Catalog.

fields.name: constant
fields.description:
Restrict modification of the characteristic via PATCH API:
Yes - characteristic is not patchable
No - characteristic is patchable

fields.name: description
fields.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the productSpecCharacteristic is

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of ProdSpecCharValueUse

fields.name: mandatory
fields.description: It shows if the characteristic is mandatory.

fields.name: mask
fields.description: The mask characteristic values are checked on.

fields.name: maxCardinality
fields.description: The maximum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where five is the value for the maxCardinality

fields.name: minCardinality
fields.description: The minimum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where zero is the value for the minCardinality

fields.name: modifiable
fields.description: It shows if the characteristic may be modified.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the associated productSpecCharacteristic

fields.name: operator
fields.description: It defines the operator that will be allied to the characteristic value. Can be "Equal", "Within" "In", "Not Equal", "Not Within", "Not In"

fields.name: placeHolder
fields.description: The text to be displayed in the field.

fields.name: propagateEnteredValue
fields.description: if true value is propagated down to hierarchy.

fields.name: propagateTo
fields.description: Referenced characteristic where to propagate the value

fields.name: regularExpression
fields.description: regexp to be checked by Quotation Engine

fields.name: validFor
fields.description: The period for which the Product Specification Characteristic Usage is valid. TimePeriod contains startDateTime (type:DateTime) and endDateTime (type: DateTime).

fields.name: valueType
fields.description:
A kind of value that the characteristic value can take on:
NUMBER("Number")
TEXT("Text")
DECIMAL("Decimal")
DATE("Date")
OBJECT("Object")
PHONE("Phone")
MEMO("Memo")
CMS_RESOURCE("CMS Resource")
UNEXPECTED("Unexpected")

fields.name: visible
fields.description: It shows if the characteristic is visible in UI.

fields.name: productSpecCharacteristicValue
fields.description: Characteristic Values

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: Default Characteristic Values

fields.name: availableValue
fields.description: Available Characteristic Values

fields.name: extendedParameters
fields.description: Extended parameters in <String, List<String>> format

fields.name: quoteOnlyByPassInit
fields.description: Defines if empty value is acceptable in case of product modification

fields.name: businessType
fields.description: Business Type of the characteristic.

fields.name: localizedData
fields.description: Link to appropriate localization data. Used for name, description localization in UI.

fields.name: externalCharacteristicId
fields.description: External Id of Product Offering Characteristic.

fields.name: valueFrom
fields.description: Min value of the numeric product offering characteristic

fields.name: valueTo
fields.description: Max value of the numeric product offering characteristic

fields.name: technical
fields.description: Attribute reflects that the Characteristic is technical and should be hidden from the User on UI.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar. 'specifiedByUrl' is a valid field

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.
